attributes.action: Stop the closing of the Hertford McDonalds MacciesMovement
attributes.additional_details: The petition for the closing of the Hertford McDonald’s that we’d like to counter: https://democracy.hertfordshire.gov.uk/Data/County%20Council/201807171000/Agenda/RhpFfNmvqHpuD32fP4zfPOwso2NM7.pdf
attributes.background: For the past decades, the McDonald’s on the Rush Green roundabaout in Hertford has provided many people with great memories and of course great food. We will never give up on our maccies. We will fight until the end.

rejection.details: You could start a petition to Hertfordshire Council instead.
